"Echoes of the Past": A psychological thriller that follows a detective who can communicate with the echoes of people's past lives. Each episode explores a different case, where the detective must navigate the complex web of memories and emotions to uncover the truth. The twist: the echoes are not just passive observers, but active participants in the present, influencing the lives of those around them.

"The Memory Merchants": A science fiction series set in a world where memories can be extracted, stored, and even sold on the black market. The story follows a group of memory thieves who use their skills to pull off high-stakes heists, while being pursued by a ruthless memory detective who will stop at nothing to catch them. Along the way, they uncover a conspiracy that threatens the very fabric of society.

"The Last Refuge": A post-apocalyptic drama that takes place in a world where a catastrophic event has caused widespread destruction and chaos. The story follows a group of survivors who take refuge in an underground bunker, only to discover that they are not alone. As they navigate the treacherous world above, they must also confront the secrets and lies within their own group, and the true nature of their sanctuary.

"The Island of Lost Things": A fantasy series that takes place on a mystical island where lost objects from throughout history have washed up. The story follows a group of treasure hunters who seek to uncover the secrets of the island, while being drawn into a world of magic and wonder. As they delve deeper into the island's mysteries, they must confront the consequences of their own desires and the true cost of their discoveries.

"The Department of Unlikely Solutions": A comedy-drama series that follows a team of eccentric scientists and engineers who work for a top-secret government agency tasked with solving the world's most bizarre and inexplicable problems. From alien invasions to supernatural occurrences, the team must use their unorthodox methods to save the world from the impossible. Along the way, they must navigate the red tape of bureaucracy and confront their own personal demons.
